cS356A2

Class IndividualUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode
      • cS356A2.Users
        • cS356A2.IndividualUser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer, Subject, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, javax.swing.tree.MutableTreeNode, javax.swing.tree.TreeNode

    public class IndividualUser
extends Users
implements Observer, Subject
    This class is used to create Individual User objects for use in a default tree model. Note this inheritance is sound, although Individual Users cannot have children, DefaultMutableTree can also not have children. Whether they are allowed to have children is determined by the boolean variable allowsChildren
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Oscar Nevarez
    See Also:
    DefaultMutableTreeNode, Serialized Form

      • follow

        public void follow(IndividualUser user)
        Adds the supplied user object to this objects subject list. The supplied user object registers this object as an observer.
        Parameters:

      • tweet

        public void tweet(java.lang.String message)
        Sets the message of this object to the supplied message string. Adds the string to the news feed list and sets the chageState flag to true. Notifies registered observers.
        Parameters:
        message - a message that will be added to this objects news feed.
